page.title: Reminder: 2011 Washington GIS Conference call for papers ...

snippet.s: Reminder: 2011 Washington GIS Conference call for papers deadline is this Thursday, March 31!

text.s: Join LinkedIn for free to participate in the conversation. When you join, you can comment and post your own discussions.
Reminder: 2011 Washington GIS Conference call for papers deadline is this Thursday, March 31

There are only a few days left to submit your paper abstract for the Washington GIS Conference, May 9-11 in Lynnwood, WA. The deadline is March 31. Don't miss your opportunity to share experience, expertise, and knowledge with colleagues and offer solutions for successSubmit your abstract now so you may join many of your peers presenting on subjects such as:
How to Assemble a Transportation Network
Wildfire Hazards at the Wildland-Urban Interface
Speakers are eligible to attend the Monday training workshops for just an additional $10 over the Tuesday-Wednesday registration. This is a $75 savings
The 2011 Washington GIS Conference Planning Committee
